actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President pro tempore of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Edward M. Kennedy, of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Authorizes the President pro tempore of the Senate to administer the oath of office to Senator Edward M. Kennedy during a recess or adjournment.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President pro tempore of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Edward M. Kennedy, of Massachusetts.
